import React, { useState , useEffect } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import regUserData from './registration_user_data.json' class Registration extends component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state={ id:'', fname:'', lname:'', email:'', password:'', cpassword:'', location:'' } } render() { const inputhandler=(e)=> { this.setState( { ...this.regUserData , [e.target.name] : e.target.value }) } return( <> {/* heading */}

REGISTRATION FORM

{/* heading */} {/* registration form */}
{/* registration form */} ) } } export default Registration;
